text: We'll hear argument next in No. 91-321, Itel Containers International Corporation v. Joe Huddleston.
Mr. Chief Justice, may it please the Court:
Mr. Chief Justice, and may it please the Court:
Thank you, Mr. Chief Justice, and may it please the Court:
As pointed out by the United Kingdom in its brief, the signatory nations to this convention have followed the uniform practice of failing to impose taxes like Tennessee's for 36 years.
